product_name: NYX Professional MakeupButtermelt Pressed Powder Natural Finish Bronzer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackNYX Professional Makeup Buttermelt Bronzer blends like powder & glides like butta! For a, sun-soaked bronze with a natural finish and 12 hours of wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsLook butta than ever when you turn up this bronze! This buildable, lightweight formula is infused with mango butter, shea butter, and almond butter! For a transfer resistant, fade-resistant & crease-resistant look for up to 12 hours.Get buttered up in buttalicous shades for all skin tones that are never greasy, muddy, ashy, or patchy! Use the Buttermelt Bronzer Brush to sweep the formula with ease add dimension!Item 2623793How To UseWant to know how to achieve that buttered up sun-soaked bronze? NYX got you! To bring the heat, using buttermelt bronzer brush sweep on starting from the temple, across the cheek, and along the jawline. Using remaining pigment to blend onto the neck and d√©collet√©. Apply in a circular motion, continuously blending and buffing where the sun naturally hits! There you have it a buttered-up glow that's not going to budge!IngredientsButta Biscuit: Mica, Talc, CI 77492 / Iron Oxides, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, Zinc Stearate, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Octyldodecanol, Mangifera Indica Seed Butter / Mango Seed Butter, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Caprylyl Glycol, Isostearyl Isostearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, CI 15850 / Red 6, Parfum / Fragrance
how_to_use: Want to know how to achieve that buttered up sun-soaked bronze? NYX got you! To bring the heat, using buttermelt bronzer brush sweep on starting from the temple, across the cheek, and along the jawline. Using remaining pigment to blend onto the neck and d√©collet√©. Apply in a circular motion, continuously blending and buffing where the sun naturally hits! There you have it a buttered-up glow that's not going to budge!
ingredients: Mangifera Indica Seed Butter / Mango Seed Butter
Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil

reviews.headline: The feel and color rival more expensive brands.
reviews.comments: I am usually skeptical of new bronzers. I was more than pleasantly surprised by this NYX product. I love it! Goes on smoothly, blends beautifully and provides just the right amount of pigment.

reviews.headline: I would not recommend
reviews.comments: Blends poorly and looks patchy. It even stained my makeup. I do like the scent and the color, but overall it didn't work for me.

reviews.headline: I like the product but hate the smell
reviews.comments: The product is really nice but it smells like playdough- the one smell that causes nausea for me.

reviews.headline: Treat it like a porcelain doll
reviews.comments: I bought this online for in store pick up and am thankful I opened it up in store. It was completely broken and went all over the counter (sorry ulta), luckily the associate exchanged it for me. I've used it once and when I went to use it a second time, a sliver at the bottom was broken and had come out. I am not rough with my makeup bag and it is fairly padded, so for this product to become so damaged so easily is really disappointing.

reviews.headline: NOT FOR ACNE PRONE SKIN
reviews.comments:
I wanted to love this product since it's so affordable and leaves a beautiful contour around my face, but‚Ä¶ it clogged my pores terribly. After a couple of days of using this, my cheekbones and forehead began to break out and become incredibly bumpy. Another con about this product is its smell. For me, I could deal with the smell, but was not the biggest fan, as it smelled very chemically.

Overall, if you are a acne prone girly like me, I would stay away from this product, or try another bronzer before trying this.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: Best bronzer I have ever used!!!!
reviews.comments: I have light to medium skin with neutral undertones and all butta up is the perfect undertone! I dont wear foundation and it sits perfect on my skin. Even with a bit warmer skin, it is the perfect barely there bronzer. Please never stop making thisüôèüèª

reviews.headline: DAMAGED, LOW QUALITY PRODUCT
reviews.comments: Product came opened and damaged. Spilled all over my wooden floors and left a stain. So disappointed. Made a huge mess and there isn't even any product leftover that is salvagable to use. The texture is like sand and very bad quality. NEVER PURCHASE.

reviews.headline: Silky Perfect Pigment
reviews.comments: The formula of these is so silky and smooth, it lays down beautifully. Go in with a light hand because these are pigmented. When choosing your shade, don't go by how it looks in the pan. The container's color is actually a more accurate representation if you can't swatch it and are struggling to decide which one is for you. I would definitely recommend these as a budget-friendly option for bronzer.

reviews.headline: üòé
reviews.comments: Finally a bronzer for us cool-tone girlies!  Affordable!  Effective!  Easy to apply!  You got me for life!

reviews.headline: I love this! But..
reviews.comments: I wish they would change the way it opens because it has caused me to drop it twice. I went to buy another and opened it today and it is broken up again. I don't know why this is happening but it is becoming messy and wasteful. My favorite bronzer out there though!

reviews.headline: DO NOT order for delivery
reviews.comments: I had been meaning to try out this bronzer because I've heard good things. However, I ordered it online and it arrived completely shattered. The other stuff in the package was covered in the bronzer. Really upsetting. Didn't get to try.

reviews.headline: Hard to blend and orange
reviews.comments: The payoff color is decent, but it's a bit orange on me rather than sunkissed brown. Some say it's pigmented, but I slightly disagree, I feel like it disappears after I dab the bronzer on my face and needs to build up quite a lot. It's also hard to blend out and you have to work fast. Also, the packaging is slightly hard to open.

reviews.headline: Why?
reviews.comments: This is an incredible formula and value from NYX. But this shade range is so pink, even the neutrals look warm. Too warm. They all look like a variant on the same shade of warm, pink, brown. I bought the two deepest shades and used them 3 total times before I tossed them. I wanted golden glow, not "I forgot to put my sunscreen on." I hope other ladies have a better time than I did. But as far as I can tell, these are blushes and not bronzers.

reviews.headline: so goodddd
reviews.comments: This product is probably one of the most interesting products I have ever tried. It is just so buttery and good.

reviews.headline: Looks amazing!
reviews.comments: I got Do better shade and it has amazing pay off. I have to swirl my brush on my hand before applying. I may try a lighter shade for the fall/winter. If someone says there isn't enough pay off then they need to go a shade darker. I am tan medium skin tone and it works fine. So I would assume someone with even a darker completion would work well.

reviews.headline: Love the texture
reviews.comments: Would definitely buy again. Reasoning for 4 stars is because the color is a little too dark for me and I already broke it. Biggest con of powders. But the texture is amazing, highly pigmented and super buildable.

reviews.headline: okay bronzer
reviews.comments: good bronzer, good shade range, color pay off is decent just needs a little extra blending effort than some ofher brands. I find it extremely hard to open the package every morning i do have medium ish length nails but idk if its is so i wouldnt reccomend if you normally stuggle with those types of things

reviews.headline: Favorite bronzer but
reviews.comments: You discontinued my shade butta cup!  WHY?üò¢

reviews.headline: i love it
reviews.comments: a very good product, smells so good

media.headline: I would buy this again, my new fave!

New bronzer from my favorite makeup brand

faceoff_positive.comments: This bronzer is so beautiful and smells deliciousüíñ
faceoff_positive.headline: New bronzer from my favorite makeup brand

faceoff_negative.comments: NYX Buttermelt Bronzer in ButtercupAs a makeup enthusiast always on the lookout for the next best bronzer, I recently tried out the NYX Buttermelt Bronzer in the shade Buttercup. Here's my take:Pigmentation: The pigmentation of this bronzer is impressive. With just a light swipe, it delivers a beautiful warm tone that adds a natural-looking sun-kissed glow to the skin.Texture: True to its name, the Buttermelt Bronzer has a smooth and creamy texture. It blends effortlessly into the skin, leaving behind a seamless finish without any patchiness.Longevity: One of the standout features of this bronzer is its longevity. It stays put throughout the day without fading or oxidizing, keeping my complexion looking fresh from morning till night.Shade Selection: While I opted for the shade Buttercup, NYX offers a range of shades to suit various skin tones. Buttercup, in particular, is perfect for light to medium skin tones, imparting a subtle warmth without appearing too orange or muddy.Packaging: The compact packaging of the Buttermelt Bronzer is sleek and travel-friendly, making it convenient to toss into your makeup bag for touch-ups on the go.Overall Impression: Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with the NYX Buttermelt Bronzer in Buttercup. Its pigmentation, texture, longevity, and shade selection make it a standout product in the world of bronzers. Whether you're going for a natural daytime look or a more glam evening vibe, this bronzer is versatile enough to complement any makeup style.If you're in the market for a new bronzer, I highly recommend giving the NYX Buttermelt Bronzer a try,
faceoff_negative.headline: Great bronzer for beginners
